author: g11tech
content:
on EL side, if the EL is also rebased on capella devnet targets, these EIPs should be also part of next devnet (in shanghai activation) (from https://notes.ethereum.org/@parithosh/zhejiang-testnet-spec): ```
EIP-3651: Warm COINBASE
EIP-3855 : PUSH0
EIP-3860 : Limit/meter initcode
```

author: g11tech
content: yes (to CL using ssz for roots/hashes), but i don't think CL worries itself with transaction hash calc, but ELs should be in consensus (for tx broadcasting and for tx reference/signing)
